description: Higher-order functions and common patterns for asynchronous code
name: async

scripts.coveralls: npm run coverage && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.lint: eslint --fix lib/ test/ perf/memory.js perf/suites.js perf/benchmark.js support/build/ support/*.js karma.conf.js
scripts.mocha-test: npm run mocha-node-test && npm run mocha-browser-test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha-node-test
